resources.string: Required: Base price of your property
Optional: 20% set as default, if left empty
Optional: Helps get most accurate local rates
This app uses the following opensource libraries and we thank the contributors for their awesome efforts.

Check to see if your url is properly formed: delimiters, character cases, etc.
Check if you have provided a ZWSID in your API call. If yes, check if the ZWSID is keyed in correctly. If it still does not work, contact Zillow to get help with fixing your ZWSID.
The Zillow Web Service is currently not available. Please come back later and try again.
The Zillow Web Service is currently not available. Please come back later and try again.
Make sure the price parameter is specified and is a valid integer.
Make sure the zip parameter is specified and is a valid five digit ZIP code.
Make sure the down or dollarsdown parameter is specified and is a valid integer or Region specified was not found.
Zillow Mortgage Marketplace rate data is currently unavailable. Please come back later and try again.
Incorrect combination of parameters. When querying by zip code, only include the zip parameter.
Returns a set of market, affordability, real estate, and demographic data
